Choose a unique Site Name
Prepend the Org Code at the beginning of the Site Name followed by a dash; do not use sub-ministry Org Codes
To identify your Org Code, please see this link:  https://bcgov.sharepoint.com/sites/O365SharePoint/SitePages/ORG-Code-List.aspx
Site Name should not be generic; choose a Site Name that is meaningful
Example of accepted Site Name:  CITZ-OCIO_Projects (instead of just CITZ-Projects)
Most special characters including spaces are not allowed in the Site Name
Alpha & Numeric characters are allowed, as well as dashes ( - ) and underscore ( _
